creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: rectangular waistband, 7-1/2\" long x 15\" wide with long white ties with two black cross stitched bands and one printed ribbon band, green; falling at right angles from ties, 3\" from waistband are 25\" x 3-1/4\" strips with cross stitch; hand embroidery covers waist with floral and geometrics in green, pink and blue; black lower section is pleated with three embroidered tapes, additional colors of yellow, green and red; waist lined in blue
title: Apron
